"DON'T EVEN THINK IT!" This was not the time for sarcasm.

Lunarpine reached the end of the forrest and paused in case Megs had 
arranged backup. He smelled the air if there were preds nearby he'd 
smell them. Nothing in the air so he transformed to bot and crept his 
way towards the entrance.

"Ramhorn what's your location?"

He looked over toward Shadow Wing,"Stay out here where it's..." He 
wanted to say "Safe" But didn't want to patronize her."Where you and 
these three can provide coverfire if more pests show up."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She replied,"Oh yeah, this feathered bot can take on something like 
> that one winged with no problem." with heavy sarcasm in her voice.
> "Or better yet, how about I just wait here untill you arrive. No 
> sence in me having all hte fun." she chuckled. She knew that she 
had 
> no chance against someone like Megatron in a one on one fight. She 
> was going to adhere to what Lunarpine said and take his advice 
> serousely. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine responds, after hearing the two reports, "That must be 
> > Megatron, he's one bad (Shutcho mouth I'm only talking about 
Sfaft 
> we 
> > can dig it, (Sorry I'm starting to channel Wreck Gar.)) "Back off 
> > Wing, he's destroyed civilizations without any help. You can't 
> > possibly beat a bot that srtong, wait for me." Lunarpine knew 
> > Megatrons Reputation, he knew it would take more than she had, he 
> > knew that even his skills might not be enough to down the tyrant.
> >
